Advanced Pure Mathematics.description: Choose 9 credits (3 courses) from advanced Algebra, Analysis, Geometry, or Topology.

Applied Mathematics/Statistics.description: Choose 6 credits (2 courses) from Numerical Analysis, Optimization, Probability, or Statistics.

capstone.title: Senior Capstone Project in Mathematics
capstone.description: An independent research project or advanced seminar culminating in a written report and presentation.

mastery_exam.description: A comprehensive examination covering core areas of undergraduate mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra, Real Analysis, Abstract Algebra). Requires a minimum score of 70% to pass.
